ns2:p.#text: The organization protects the information system from damage resulting from water leakage by providing master shutoff valves that are accessible, working properly, and known to key personnel.

This control, to include any enhancements specified, may be satisfied by similar requirements fulfilled by another organizational entity other than the information security program. Organizations avoid duplicating actions already covered.
The organization employs mechanisms that, without the need for manual intervention, protect the information system from water damage in the event of a water leak.
